name: Mexican Bruschetta
description: Salsa is an easy “go to” for quick snacks and dishes. Use it as a topper for nacho chips, crackers, or even chicken or fish.
preparation: In a bowl, stir tomatoes with Poco Picante Salsa Mix. Gently fold in avocado and stir in lime juice, if you wish.
Dish up with tortilla chips or crackers.
tips: Make it a meal by adding cooked chicken or low-sodium tuna. Wrap and roll in a tortilla.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
